net.sourceforge.jasa.market.rules
Class ShoutTypeBasedAcceptingPolicy

java.lang.Object
  net.sourceforge.jasa.market.rules.OrderAcceptancePolicy
      net.sourceforge.jasa.market.rules.QuoteBeatingAcceptingPolicy
          net.sourceforge.jasa.market.rules.ShoutTypeBasedAcceptingPolicy
All Implemented Interfaces:
net.sourceforge.jabm.event.EventListener, net.sourceforge.jabm.util.Parameterizable, MarketEventListener
public class ShoutTypeBasedAcceptingPolicy
extends QuoteBeatingAcceptingPolicy

implements the shout-accepting rule under which a shout must be more competitive than an estimated equilibrium. The equilibrium is estimated through some learning algorithm, e.g. sliding-window-average learning and widrowhoff learning, by training with transaction prices.

Version:
$Revision: 1.3 $
Author:
Jinzhong Niu
